<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodline Robe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2319)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 147 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn garment

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Each _bloodline robe_ has a design that befits a particular [sorcerer](/Classes.aspx?ID=11) bloodline, depicting creatures of that bloodline or using styles common among them. You gain a +2 item bonus to each of your bloodline skills.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** You're benefiting from your blood magic effect; **Effect** You're [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) on your next turn. You can use the extra action only as part of Casting a bloodline spell.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a sorcerer bloodline spell. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

**Craft Requirements** You are a sorcerer of the bloodline tied to the robe.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bloodline Robe
